REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0436 reute d f BC-GRUMMAN-CORP-<GQ>-GET 04-17 0052

TEXT.TITLE: GRUMMAN CORP <GQ> GETS 77 MLN DLR NAVY CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: Grumman Aerospace Corp is being awarded a 77 mln dlr increment to a Navy contract related to fiscal 1988 A-6F aircraft production, the Defense Department said. It said work on the contract is expected to be completed in October 1990. Reuter
